# Avelo - WhatsApp Business API Solution

> Avelo is the complete platform for WhatsApp Business API. Automate marketing, sales, and support in one place.

## Core Products
- **Official API**: Direct access to WhatsApp Cloud API infrastructure.
- **Team Inbox**: Multi-agent support inbox for your team.
- **Flow Builder**: Drag & Drop chatbot builder.
- **Analytics**: Detailed insights and reporting.

## Solutions
- Marketers: Run broadcasts, retargeting campaigns, and click-to-WhatsApp ads.
- Sales Teams: Qualify leads automatically and manage pipelines.
- Support Teams: Automate FAQs and route complex queries to agents.
